text: Kare-ra wa, tada tenshi-tachi ga yattekuru no o matsu no ka, matawa omo ga nozoma reru ka, matawa (shinpan no hi no sekkin o shiru) omo no shirushi no ichibu ga yattekuru no o matsu bakaridearu. Omo no nanrakano shirushi ga yattekuru hi, maemotte shinkō shite zenkō ni hagende inai kagiri, kare-ra no shinkō ga tamashī ni yakudatsu koto wanaidearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Anata gata wa mate. Watashi mo matsu monodearu
